We establish the similarity between a given vector of the corpus evaluation with all the codebook vectors of its domain, and the highest similarity value corresponds to the disambiguated sense (winner sense).
If it is not possible to find a sense (it is impossible to obtain the cosine similarity value), we assign by default the most frequent sense (e.g. the first sense in WordNet).

sections.heading: 5 Conclusion
text: This paper presents a new approach based on neural networks to disambiguate the word senses.
We have used the LVQ algorithm to train a neural network to carry out the English lexical sample and English all words tasks.
We have integrated two linguistic resources in the corpus provided by the organization: WordNet and SemCor.
